fields.description: Property id with level and index
fields.name: id

fields.description: Name of property's datatype. Can only ever be null if the type is any
fields.name: typeName

fields.description: TRUE iff property value survives power-on reset
fields.name: isPersistent

fields.description: TRUE iff property is a sequence
fields.name: isSequence

fields.description: TRUE iff property is marked as deprecated
fields.name: isDeprecated

fields.description: Optional flag which indicates if the property is readonly and constant (the device has no means to change the value)
fields.name: isConstant

fields.description: Optional constraints on top of the underlying data type
fields.name: constraints
